channel.title: 317 run gliding and teleports
channel.description:
when you run with a godsword it glides and it gets really annoying, can any one help me?
And teleports when you click monster teleport it comes up with KBD, how do I change what it says to like KBD (WILD!)
If you can help me with any one of them that would be soooo kwlll!
